TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PixelFormats extends System.Object
public ref class PixelFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 代表受支援像素格式的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of supported pixel formats.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr101010 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr101010 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 都配置了 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式會使用每像素資料的 24 位元 (8[!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]針對每個三種主要色彩藍色、 綠色和紅色)。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] for each of the three primary colors blue, green, and red). 這會轉譯為 256 階灰階的每種主要色彩，以提供每個映像最多 16 萬種色彩。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 若要顯示映像、 監視和控制站必須是能夠顯示至少 32,000 的色彩。To display images, the monitor and controller must be capable of displaying at least 32,000 colors. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr555 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 都配置了 5 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 5 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr565 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr565 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 16 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 分別配置了 5、6 和 5 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 5, 6, and 5 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgra32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgra32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色、紅色和 Alpha) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each channel (blue, green, red, and alpha) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BlackWhite As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat BlackWhite { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得黑白像素格式，這種格式會將每像素一個位元的資料顯示為黑色或白色。

span.span: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cmyk32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Cmyk32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式，其顯示 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]，其中每一個色頻 (青色、洋紅色、黃色和黑色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMYK 色彩系統通常用於列印墨水的差異在於白皮書。The CMYK color system is often used in printing inks for paper. 這種色彩表示是色彩的的表單 cmyk （C %、 M %、 Y %，K %），其中 C、 M、 Y 和 K 青色、 洋紅色、 黃色和黑色值的百分比值。This type of color representation is of the form cmyk (C%, M%, Y%, K%), where C, M, Y, and K are the percent values for the cyan, magenta, yellow, and black values of the color. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Default { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得最適合特定作業的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.
The best suited for the particular operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就技術上而言不是像素格式，但而存取的方法的像素格式最適合特定作業。 is technically not a pixel format but rather a way to access the pixel format best suited for a particular operation. 其中的特定像素格式並不重要的情況下使用此格式。This format is used for situations where the specific pixel format is not important. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Gray16 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray16 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式，這種格式會顯示每像素 16 位元灰階色頻，可顯示 65536 階灰階。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays a 16 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 65536 shades of gray.

summary.span: 這個格式的 Gamma 為 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Gray2 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray2 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式，這種格式會顯示每像素 2 位元灰階色頻，可顯示 4 階灰階。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays a 2 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 4 shades of gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Gray32Float As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray32Float { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
會顯示 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]灰階色頻，可顯示超過 40 億階灰階。

span.span: displays a 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] grayscale channel, allowing over 4 billion shades of gray.

summary.span: 這個格式的 Gamma 為 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Gray4 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray4 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式，這種格式會顯示每像素 4 位元灰階色頻，可顯示 16 階灰階。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays a 4 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 16 shades of gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Gray8 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray8 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式，這種格式會顯示每像素 8 位元灰階色頻，可顯示 256 階灰階。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays an 8 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 256 shades of gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed1 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed1 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用 2 個色彩指定調色盤點陣圖的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

value.span: 使用 2 個色彩指定調色盤點陣圖的像素格式。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤的映像使用色彩表決定影像的色彩使用方式。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 映像中的每個像素會對應至資料表或選擇區中特定的色彩。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 每個色彩調色盤中的識別其索引號碼或對應至資料表中其位置的值。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 像素格式具有 2 個資料表中可用的色彩。The pixel format has 2 colors available in the table. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed2 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed2 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用 4 個色彩指定調色盤點陣圖的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 4 colors.

value.span: 使用 4 個色彩指定調色盤點陣圖的像素格式。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 4 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤的映像使用色彩表決定影像的色彩使用方式。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 映像中的每個像素會對應至資料表或選擇區中特定的色彩。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 每個色彩調色盤中的識別其索引號碼或對應至資料表中其位置的值。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 像素格式具有 4 個資料表中可用的色彩。The pixel format has 4 colors available in the table. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤的映像使用色彩表決定影像的色彩使用方式。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 映像中的每個像素會對應至資料表或選擇區中特定的色彩。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 每個色彩調色盤中的識別其索引號碼或對應至資料表中其位置的值。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 像素格式具有 16 個資料表中可用的色彩。The pixel format has 16 colors available in the table. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 256 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤的映像使用色彩表決定影像的色彩使用方式。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 映像中的每個像素會對應至資料表或選擇區中特定的色彩。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 每個色彩調色盤中的識別其索引號碼或對應至資料表中其位置的值。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 像素格式具有資料表中可用的 256 種色彩。The pixel format has 256 colors available in the table. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pbgra32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Pbgra32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色、紅色和 Alpha) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each channel (blue, green, red, and alpha) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

summary.span: 每個色頻都會先乘以 Alpha 值。

span.span: Each color channel is pre-multiplied by the alpha value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Rgb128Float { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

每一個色頻都配置了 32 [!INCLUDE[tla2#tla_bpp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Rgb24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Rgb24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (紅色、綠色和藍色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式會使用 24 位元的每個像素 （每三種主要色彩紅色、 綠色和藍色的每個像素 8 位元） 的資料。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 bits per pixel for each of the three primary colors red, green, and blue). 這會轉譯為 256 階灰階的每種主要色彩，以提供每個映像最多 16 萬種色彩。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 映像會與相同映像，但的色頻 （紅色、 綠色和藍色） 位於不同的順序。An image is the same as a image, but the color channels (red, green, and blue) are in a different order. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 這個格式的 Gamma 為 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.
